entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Matapedia
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
